translations: adv．遥测地：通过遥测技术进行测量、监测或传输数据的方式。
· The data was transmitted telemetrically from the satellite to the ground station.
数据通过遥测技术从卫星传输到地面站。

sentences.sentence: The housing has at least one antenna that can be configured to communicate telemetrically with a transceiver regardless of a rotational orientation of the housing about an axis.
sentences.translation: 外壳具有至少一个天线，所述至少一个天线被构造 成与收发器遥测通信而与外壳围绕轴线的转动定向无关。
